info.title: 8x8 Analytics for Contact Center Real-time Metrics API
info.description:
The 8x8 Analytics for Contact Center Real-time Metrics API enables you to obtain the latest, real-time statistical data on queues and agents queue interactions. In addition to real-time data (which is refreshed every 5 seconds) you can also obtain data for select 15 or 30-minute intervals.

The Real-time API supports both JSON and XML file response formats. You can switch between both formats using the `Accept` header.

**Note**: the Real-time metrics endpoint is available on the following URLs:
```
https://api.8x8.com/analytics/cc/v1/realtime-metrics/
https://api.8x8.com/analytics/cc/v2/realtime-metrics/
https://api.8x8.com/analytics/cc/v3/realtime-metrics/
https://api.8x8.com/analytics/cc/v4/realtime-metrics/
https://api.8x8.com/analytics/cc/v5/realtime-metrics/
```

_**This page is in the Beta stage. For step-by-step instructions on using the Real-time API refer to the [Real-time Metrics Use Case](https://8x8gateway-8x8apis.apigee.io/real-time-metrics-use-case)**_.
## **Authentication**
You can try out this API through request authentication using your client credentials. Refer to [How to get API credentials](doc:how-to-get-api-keys) and [how to authenitcate](doc:oauth-authentication-for-8x8-xcaas-apis).

All requests must be made over HTTPS - calls made over HTTP will fail.


**Note**: The Real Time Metrics API uses either the **v1**, **v2**, **v3**, **v4** or **v5** path for the following URLs:
- Access token: **`https://api.8x8.com/oauth/v2/token`**

- **`GET`** request: **`https://api.8x8.com/analytics/cc/{version}/realtime-metrics/`**

tags.name: Agents
tags.description: This API retrieves realtime metrics related to agents for a given queue or group.

tags.name: Queues
tags.description: This API retrieves real-time metrics related to queues

tags.name: Groups
tags.description: This API retrieves realtime metrics related to groups.

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a list of queues. By default, the metrics for all queues are returned. The result can be filtered and paginated.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number

parameters.name: queue-ids
parameters.description: The optional set of queue identifiers. You only receive returned metrics for identified queues.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of individual elements to be returned per page.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: This parameter returns the queue summary (id, name). If this parameter is set to TRUE, queue-ids and metrics parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specified timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only).

parameters.name: includeTotals
parameters.description: Add totals for time, percentage, average and count metric.

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a specific queue. The response returns an object which contains the queue ID, queue name and a list of metric objects. The metric contains a key field with a label or description as well as a value field.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The queue identifier

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specified timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only).

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a list of agents in a select queue.  By default, all agents from the given queue will be returned. The response can be further filtered and is paginated.

parameters.name: agent-ids
parameters.description: The optional set of agent identifiers. Only metrics for selected agents is returned.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: Returns specific queue agents IDs

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of individual elements to be returned per page.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: This parameter returns the agent summary (id, name) for a specific queue. If this parameter is set to TRUE, agent-ids and metric parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specific timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only)

parameters.name: includeTotals
parameters.description: Add totals for time, percentage, average and count metric.

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a specific agent in a queue.  The agent ID, agent name and a list of metric objects. A metric object contains a `key` field with a label (description) of the metric and a `value`. The response is paginated.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: This parameter returns metrics for a specific agent. The requested agent must belong to the queue specified by the queueId parameter.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: This parameter returns specific queue agent information.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specific timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only).

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a list of groups. By default, the metrics for all groups are returned. The result can be filtered and paginated.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Returns a summary (id, name) of groups. If this parameter is set to TRUE, group-ids and metrics parameters will be ignored.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specified timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only).

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a specific group. The response returns an object which contains the group ID, group name and a list of metric objects. The metric contains a key field with a label or description as well as a value field.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specified timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only).

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a list of agents in a selected group.  By default, all agents from the given group will be returned. The response can be further filtered and is paginated.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Returns a summary (id, name) of agents for a specific group. If this parameter is set as TRUE, agent-ids and metrics parameters will be ignored.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specific timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only)

parameters.name: includeTotals
parameters.description: Add totals for time, percentage, average and count metric.

get.description: This method retrieves real-time metrics for a specific agent in a group.  The agent ID, agent name and a list of metric objects. A metric object contains a `key` field with a label (description) of the metric and a `value`. The response is paginated.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specific timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only)

get.summary: Retrieve realtime metrics for all agents in multiple queues.
get.description: Retrieve realtime metrics for all agents in multiple queues.

parameters.name: queue-ids
parameters.description: The optional set of queue identifiers. You only receive returned metrics for identified queues.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specific timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only)

get.summary: Retrieve all agents with all specified metrics within a tenant.
get.description: Retrieve all agents with all specified metrics within a tenant.

parameters.name: agent-ids
parameters.description: Optional set of agent identifiers. Only metrics for these agents will be returned.

parameters.name: group-ids
parameters.description: Optional set of group identifiers. Only metrics for these groups will be returned.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Returns a summary (id, name, group id, group name) of all agents. If this parameter is set as TRUE, agent-ids, group-ids and metrics parameters will be ignored.

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The set of metric identifiers to be returned.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The specific timezone (applicable for TODAY metrics only)

parameters.name: includeTotals
parameters.description: Add totals for time, percentage, average and count metric.

ApiKeyAuth.description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the client credentials grant flow.
